pullrequest.title: Try to brew install hg if it can't be found

content.raw:
I think that it's going to work for the generic-release example but if we have other job which uses mercurial to get the code from the repository configured in Jenkins, the job will fail in a previous point. But I think that you have covered them in pull request #442.

I'm not extremely happy with this change but at this point I assume that we have failed to find better solutions  so I'm fine with the merge if you think that it's going to make your life easier.
